Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a risky sign-in attempt due to a login associated with an impossible travel.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Microsoft 365 - Impossible Travel Activity
Query: sourcetype="m365-threat_management" eventsource="SecurityComplianceCenter" eventname="Impossible travel activity" status="success"
